runbooks.description: Wi-Fi outage root cause analysis steps

sections.title: Initial Assessment
sections.content:
1. Confirm scope (which floors/SSIDs).
2. Identify alert IDs.
3. Notify on-call if customer impact is critical.

sections.title: Data Collection
sections.content:
- Gather AP metrics: packet loss, SNR, client counts.
- Review controller logs for authentication failures.
- Correlate with change log entries in last 24h.

sections.title: Escalation Guidance
sections.content: Escalate if root cause not identified within 30 minutes or if multiple floors impacted.
